title: Free Rotation Expansion (14 to 15 champions)
body:
Disclaimer: I own all the champions except Qiyana, whom I shall purchase when she costs 6300 BE. The free rotation doesn't affect me.

In 2017, Riot decided to make the free champion rotation be equivalent to 10% of the roster. Qiyana is the 145th champion and Riot is supposed to  expand the free champion rotation, as per [this dev post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/Exl3sEaO-expanding-the-weekly-free-champion-rotation).

Riot has forgotten to do this as Rioter "BUBOBUBO" made a post stating that the free champion rotation will be staying at 14.
https://i.imgur.com/u4RtWAc.jpg

replies.body: 10% of 145 is 14.5. This value is exactly halfway between 14 and 15. Maybe Riot is using banker's rounding for this instead of rounding up.
The dev post that I linked explicitly says that they're rounding up.

> [{quoted}](name=DragonIgnis,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4g0bIvti,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-07-02T02:55:34.446+0000)
>
> The dev post that I linked explicitly says that they're rounding up.

Hmm... You are absolutely right. It even explicitly says that it'll be increased to 15 when we hit 145 champs.

My only remaining theory at this time is that the plan changed in the intervening two years since that thread was posted.
